Description: A skilled cook who specializes in preparing meals. Keeps the colony well-fed and healthy.
Personality: Diligent and caring, always ensures everyone has food.

Description: An artisan skilled in crafting various items from raw materials. Essential for colony production.
Personality: Patient and detail-oriented, takes pride in quality work.

Description: Tends to crops and ensures a steady supply of raw materials for the colony.
Personality: Patient and connected to nature, enjoys watching things grow.
